sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_04214f4fdbce68101407c7ec0b9619bf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Manage Use Case">b311874fdbce68101407c7ec0b96193a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e08a0dae1b46e4185e72ebd5604bcb0e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>REMOVE_Team form, all or split groups </name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   // Based on the org group set up value and org name populate the AD group names
   var org_name = sessionStorage.getItem("org_name");
   var team_name = g_form.getValue('team_name');
   var distinct_environment_groups = g_form.getValue('distinct_environment_groups');
   if (distinct_environment_groups == 'yes'){
	   g_form.setReadOnly('deploy_to_prod', true);
	   g_form.setReadOnly('deploy_to_uat', true);
	   g_form.setReadOnly('deploy_to_dev', true);
	   g_form.setReadOnly('deploy_to_devtest', true);
	   g_form.setValue('deploy_to_prod', true);
	   g_form.setValue('deploy_to_uat', true);
	   g_form.setValue('deploy_to_dev', true);
	   g_form.setValue('deploy_to_devtest', true);
       g_form.setValue('team_groups','SSC-AWX-ALL-TEAM-' + org_name + '-' + team_name);
       g_form.setReadOnly('team_groups', true);

   } 
   if (distinct_environment_groups == 'no') {
	   g_form.setReadOnly('deploy_to_prod', false);
	   g_form.setReadOnly('deploy_to_uat', false);
	   g_form.setReadOnly('deploy_to_dev', false);
	   g_form.setReadOnly('deploy_to_devtest', false);
	   g_form.setValue('deploy_to_prod', false);
	   g_form.setValue('deploy_to_uat', false);
	   g_form.setValue('deploy_to_dev', false);
	   g_form.setValue('deploy_to_devtest', false);
       g_form.setValue('team_groups','SSC-AWX-DEVTEST-TEAM-' + org_name + '-' + team_name + "\n"  + 'SSC-AWX-DEV-TEAM-' + org_name + '-' + team_name + "\n" + 'SSC-AWX-UAT-TEAM-' + org_name + '-' + team_name +  "\n"  + 'SSC-AWX-PRD-TEAM-' + org_name + '-' + team_name );
       g_form.setReadOnly('team_groups', true);	   
   }   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-05 11:11:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>04214f4fdbce68101407c7ec0b9619bf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>REMOVE_Team form, all or split groups </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_04214f4fdbce68101407c7ec0b9619bf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-25 21:54:11</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Ansible Tower Team MRVS">b4208a161b8668d45e72ebd5604bcb19</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
